text: The Glorieta Baldy Lookout Tower, in Santa Fe National Forest near La Cueva, Santa Fe County, New Mexico, was built in 1940. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1988. map and photos only With ==References== Category:Fire lookout towers and stations in New Mexico Category:National Register of Historic Places in San Miguel County, New Mexico Category:Buildings and structures completed in 1940
title: Glorieta Baldy Lookout Tower
